title: Forget The New MacBook Pro, Apple Has Something Better
description: If you want a macOS laptop with a bigger screen, you could choose the more expensive and in all likelihood overpowered MacBook Pro. Or you could wait, because Apple has something special planned...

title: RingCentral Dials In Strategic Partnerships With AWS And Avaya
description: Vice President and Principal Analyst, Melody Brue dives in as this week, RingCentral announced two important partnerships—one with AWS, the other with Avaya.

title: American In His 50s Develops New ‘Uncontrollable’ Irish Accent From Cancer
description: The man had a case of foreign accent syndrome (FAS). Here's what FAS is.

title: Ukraine Trench War: Soldier’s TikTok Reveals Terrifying Close Quarters Battle
description: A video posted by a Ukrainian solider to Tiktok reveals the terrifying reality of trench warfare in a shell-scarred battlefield at close range. Using a GoPro camera, he recorded five uninterrupted minutes of combat frantically defending his trench from assaulting Russian infantry and armor.

title: Bernie Sanders Proposes Tax On Robots That Take Jobs Away From Workers
description: U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders of Vermont proposed a new tax on robots Sunday over concerns automation technologies are putting people out of work. Sanders stressed he’s not opposed to technology, but said he wants to make sure that productivity gains are enjoyed by the working class.

title: How To Find And Remove Duplicate Photos And Videos In Photos For Mac
description: Mac users can reclaim storage space and tighten up their Photos library with the free duplicate functionality Apple included in macOS Ventura. Here’s how easy it is.

title: Meta Launching New $12 Verified Badge For Facebook And Instagram To Combat Impersonators
description: Meta plans to launch a new blue badge for verified accounts on Facebook and Instagram this week, according to a new announcement from CEO Mark Zuckerberg.

title: Two ‘The Last Of Us’ Actors Should Already Be Cast For Season 2
description: We are in the second half of The Last of Us season 1 now, which we know will end the events of the first game before season 2 starts the second game.

title: ‘Hogwarts Legacy’ Has No Plans For DLC, Which Seems Like A Mistake
description: Hogwarts Legacy fans hoping for new, future content for the game may have to amuse themselves with multiple playthroughs with different houses for a while. According to the game’s developer, Avalanche, DLC ain’t coming any time soon, if ever:

title: It’s Time For ‘Destiny 2’ To Make Stasis Free And Unlocked On All Characters

title: B&W’s New Pi7 S2 Earbuds Sound Superb But Won’t Tick Every Box
description: These premium true wireless earbuds from British Hi-Fi specialists B&W offer support for the latest aptX Adaptive codec and use dynamic and balanced armature drivers.

title: NASA Funds Disruptive Space Tech To Detect Very Nearby ExoEarths
description: Who says you need a conventional telescope to find exoplanets? NASA has funded a 'Phase I’ study for the development of a whole new means of detecting and then teasing spectra from very nearby exoplanetary earths.

title: From ‘Naruto’ To ‘Sailor Moon’, Viz Media Is Streaming A Bunch Of Anime For Free On YouTube
